thread.title: DONNA

author: DONNA
title: DONNA
text:
First time formal buyer here. I couldn't be happier with your ease of selection with filtering, fast and secure checkout, quick delivery, and excellent quality In stylish dresses. Can't wait to see my daughter wear it for her Valentine's dance. She loves the beautiful royal blue fabric and intricate beading. I was estatic to see you've now added returns w tags on dresses as many times we purchase a few until we decide, and inspect the color and quality. A very pleased and happy customer here. I'll definitely spread the word. I have many years of dresses to purchase for events in middle school, high school, personal engagements, and college.
Donna Bowers
